comments.author: Diana @ frontayrdfoodie
comments.content: Two things I have a weakness for! Risotto and anything remotely oniony! That looks incredible.

comments.author: roxan
comments.content:
Hi Michael - new subscriber to your blog here. What a great idea on risotto cakes, I never thought of that! I will definitely have to try that. By the way, cute little fruit and veggie creatures in your header. They look like Katamari cousins!

-roxan

comments.author: alessandra@clear.net.nz
comments.content: Lovely! This looks very restaurant-like! Not sure I had ramps, I'll look for a picture of the raw veg.

comments.author: Sarah
comments.content: I have heard that it is not possible to cultivate ramps, but I do not know if this is difinitive. I have also heard that they grow primarily int he NE and central Appalachian areas, but again, I don't know if that is hard and fast.
